resources.string: Serves as a complete reference to all shlokas with their meanings. Learn and Listen to the complete Dwadasha Stotra with detailed explanation about them.
Swipe left/right to browse through all the shlokas.
All images/media are copyrights of the respective owners wherever applicable. Thanks to http://yousigma.com/poojaslokas.html for the audio. Special Thanks to NAPS Rao for all the shloka explanations
